SELECT a.JOB_NAME jobName, a.JOB_GROUP groupName, a.JOB_CLASS_NAME jobClass, b.DESCRIPTION param, b.PREV_FIRE_TIME prevFireTime, b.NEXT_FIRE_TIME nextFireTime, b.TRIGGER_STATE triggerState, c.CRON_EXPRESSION cronExpression FROM qrtz_job_details a LEFT JOIN qrtz_triggers b ON a.JOB_NAME = b.JOB_NAME AND b.TRIGGER_GROUP = a.JOB_GROUP LEFT JOIN qrtz_cron_triggers c ON b.TRIGGER_NAME = c.TRIGGER_NAME AND b.TRIGGER_GROUP = c.TRIGGER_GROUP where a.JOB_NAME like concat('%',#{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and b.TRIGGER_STATE = #{triggerState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
